mapper.sql: id, `name`, account, `password`, states, remark, address, number, createTime, updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (`name`, account, `password`, states, remark, address, number, createTime, updateTime) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{states,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())

insert into tb_user
`name`,
account,
`password`,
states,
remark,
address,
createTime,
updateTime,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{states,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update tb_user
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
states = #{states,jdbcType=TINYINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
updateTime = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_user set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, states = #{states,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from tb_user
name like CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit #{start}, #{size}

select count(*) from tb_user
name like CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
